column5: The immense thing is reading this post, seeing the comments and realising we are not alone. I'm in my  30s and up to now I thought it was just me having those thoughts. The fear of being labelled as a drama queen, a melodramatic attention seeker. But the reality is I'm in such a dark place and I am too scared to share it with anyone. The fear of being thought of as crazy or even incapable of just being.
